page.title: 20Non-farm jobs(2):SW.Cheshire
page.content: Electrical parts are made at a 1-man workshop in Saighton & a tree surgeon in Platts Lane employs 1 other man. He covers a large area relying on a telephone directory advert & his good reputation for work.Owning a small mobile crane & a pick-up truck, as a sideline,he sells logs & Xmas trees.An antique dealer by Hatton Hall also advertises as well as having a sign on the A41 road. A Gatesheath firm deals in special tyres & parts for racing & rally cars advertising at race meetings & selling worldwide by mail order.A modern building,once used at Golborne Manor for mushroom growing is now being converted into units for eg.making spiral staircases & marble fireplaces,woodturning,overhauling pumps.Ten work at a bakery at Oak Farm which delivers bread to eg.Birkenhead. Survey by Churton Women's Institute.
